summary: Completed comprehensive testing of brand evaluation system. Backend API /api/evaluate working correctly with LLM integration. Frontend flow successfully tested: form submission, API integration, and dashboard display all functioning properly.

design_issues.issue: Chart rendering warning: width(-1) and height(-1) should be greater than 0

passed_tests: Backend error handling for invalid payloads
Frontend form field filling (Brand Names: Astra, Category: Tech, Countries: USA)
Frontend dashboard display of Astra brand name
Frontend dashboard display of Executive Summary
Frontend dashboard display of GO verdict
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor chart rendering warning in BrandRadarChart component - chart dimensions issue when container size is not properly set. This is a cosmetic issue and doesn't affect functionality.
